titleStmt.title: Jeremiah Hignell's loving and friendly advice and council given forth to the inhabitants of Bristol, and all others that may be concerned in other places.
titleStmt.author: Hignell, Jeremiah, d. 1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, by Will. Bonny, on the Back,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
